org.apache.poi.util

Class LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.ByteArrayInputStream
        • org.apache.poi.util.LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, LittleEndianInput 

    public class LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream
extends java.io.ByteArrayInputStream
implements LittleEndianInput
    Adapts a plain byte array to LittleEndianInput(将普通字节数组调整到LittleEndianInvestment)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.ByteArrayInputStream

        buf, count, mark, pos

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream(byte[] buf)
      Creates a LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream so that it uses buf as its buffer array.(创建LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream，以便它使用buf作为其缓冲区数组。)
      LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream(byte[] buf, int offset)
      Creates LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream that uses buf as its buffer array.(创建使用buf作为缓冲区数组的LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream。)
      LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream(byte[] buf, int offset, int length)
      Creates LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream that uses buf as its buffer array.(创建使用buf作为缓冲区数组的LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream。)

      void readPlain(byte[] buf, int off, int len)
      Usually acts the same as LittleEndianInput.readFully(byte[], int, int), but for an encrypted stream the raw (unencrypted) data is filled(通常作用与LittleEndianInvestment.readFully（byte[]，int，int）相同，但对于加密流，原始（未加密）数据将被填充)
      short readShort() 
      int readUByte()

    • Constructor Detail

      • LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream

        public LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream(byte[] buf,
                                        int offset,
                                        int length)
        Creates LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream that uses buf as its buffer array. The initial value of pos is offset and the initial value of count is the minimum of offset+length and buf.length. The buffer array is not copied. The buffer's mark is set to the specified offset.(创建使用buf作为缓冲区数组的LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream。pos的初始值是offset，count的初始值是offset+length和buf.length的最小值。不复制缓冲区数组。缓冲区的标记设置为指定的偏移量。)
        Parameters:
        buf - the input buffer.(buf -输入缓冲区。)
        offset - the offset in the buffer of the first byte to read.(失调-要读取的第一个字节的缓冲区中的失调。)
        length - the maximum number of bytes to read from the buffer.(长度-从缓冲区读取的最大字节数。)

      • LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream

        public LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream(byte[] buf,
                                        int offset)
        Creates LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream that uses buf as its buffer array. The initial value of pos is offset and the initial value of count is the minimum of offset+buf.length and buf.length. The buffer array is not copied. The buffer's mark is set to the specified offset.(创建使用buf作为缓冲区数组的LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream。pos的初始值是Offset，计数的初始值是Offset+buf. size和buf.lengths中的最小值。不复制缓冲区数组。缓冲区的标记设置为指定的偏移量。)
        Parameters:
        buf - the input buffer.(buf -输入缓冲区。)
        offset - the offset in the buffer of the first byte to read.(失调-要读取的第一个字节的缓冲区中的失调。)

      • LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream

        public LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream(byte[] buf)
        Creates a LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream so that it uses buf as its buffer array. The buffer array is not copied. The initial value of pos is 0 and the initial value of count is the length of buf.(创建LittleEndianByteArrayInputStream，以便它使用buf作为其缓冲区数组。不复制缓冲区数组。pos的初始值为0，计数的初始值为buf的长度。)
        Parameters:
        buf - the input buffer.(buf -输入缓冲区。)

      • readPlain

        public void readPlain(byte[] buf,
                      int off,
                      int len)
        Description copied from interface: LittleEndianInput
        Usually acts the same as LittleEndianInput.readFully(byte[], int, int), but for an encrypted stream the raw (unencrypted) data is filled(通常作用与LittleEndianInvestment.readFully（byte[]，int，int）相同，但对于加密流，原始（未加密）数据将被填充)
        Specified by:
        readPlain in interface LittleEndianInput(readPlain在接口LittleEndianInput中)
        Parameters:
        buf - the byte array to receive the bytes(buf -接收字节的字节数组)
        off - the start offset into the byte array(off -字节数组的开始偏差)
        len - the amount of bytes to fill(len -要填充的字节量)

      • limit

        public void limit(int size)
        Change the limit of the ByteArrayInputStream(更改ByteArrayInputStream的限制)
        Parameters:
        size - the new limit - is truncated to length of internal buffer(大小（新限制）被截断为内部缓冲区的长度)
